text: The Visegr치d Group (also the Visegr치d Four or V4) is a group of four Central European countries: the Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland and Slovakia. It was created in 1991 in Visegr치d, Hungary for the purposes of better cooperation among these countries. == Other websites == * Official website Category:History of the Czech Republic Category:20th-century establishments in Hungary Category:Slovakia Category:1991 establishments in Poland Category:Political organizations based in Europe Category:European organizations
